item.title: US-20 West/NE-71 South/NE-2 East at NE-71/NE-2
item.description: US-20 West/NE-71 South/NE-2 East at NE-71/NE-2 in Crawford.

item.title: US-20 West/NE-71 South/NE-2 East at NE-71/NE-2
item.description: US-20 West/NE-71 South/NE-2 East at NE-71/NE-2 in Crawford. Use NE-71 South/NE-2 East to Alliance; use US-20 West for Fort Robinson and Harrison.

item.title: US-20 West/NE-2 East/NE-71 South at NE-2/NE-71
item.description: US-20 West/NE-2 East/NE-71 South at NE-2/NE-71 in Crawford.

item.title: US-20 West/NE-2 East/NE-71 South - Crawford
item.description: US-20 West/NE-2 East/NE-71 South in Crawford

item.title: US-20 West at NE-2/NE-71
item.description: US-20 West at NE-2/NE-71 in Crawford. NE-2 East/NE-71 South joins US-20 through Crawford.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching NE-2/NE-71
item.description: US-20 West approaching NE-2/NE-71 in Crawford. Use NE-2 West/NE-71 South to Toadstool Park. Continue on US-20 West/NE-2 East/NE-71 South to Harrison (via US-20), and Scotts Bluff (via NE-71/NE-2).

item.title: NE-71 North Approaching NE-53E Link
item.description: NE-71 North approaching NE-53E Link. Use NE-53E Link North for Kimball; continue north on NE-71 for Scottsbluff and Gering.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22 Offramp at NE-71
item.description: I-80 West - Exit 22 offramp at NE-71. Turn right for NE-71 North/To US-30.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22 Offramp at NE-71
item.description: I-80 West - Exit 22 offramp at NE-71. Turn right on NE-71 for Kimball, Gering, and Scottsbluff.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 22 - Kimball East Entrance.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 22 - NE-71 North/Scottsbluff/Gering.

item.title: I-80 West - Kimball Exits
item.description: Kimball Exits on I-80 West. E Entrance - NE-71 North and W Entrance - NE-71 South.

item.title: US-26/NE-92 East/NE-71 South at NE-92/NE-71
item.description: US-26/NE-92 East/NE-72 South at NE-92 East/NE-71 South to Gering and Kimball. Continue east on US-26 for Bridgeport.

item.title: US-26/NE-92 East/NE-71 South approaching NE-92/NE-71 Junction
item.description: US-26/NE-92 East/NE-71 South approaching NE-92/NE-71 Junction in Scotts Bluff County.

item.title: US-26/NE-92 East/NE-71 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-26/NE-92 East/NE-71 South. Distance to Minatare and Bridgeport.

item.title: US-26/NE-92 East/NE-71 South - Scottsbluff
item.description: US-26/NE-92 East/NE-71 South in Scottsbluff

item.title: US-26/NE-92 East Approaching NE-71 North
item.description: US-26/NE-92 East approaching NE-71 North and Ave I. NE-71 South joins US-26/NE-92 east through Scottsbluff.

item.title: US-26 East at NE-92
item.description: US-26 East at NE-92 in Scotts Bluff County. Turn left for NE-92 West; continue straight for US-26/NE-92 East and for NE-71.

item.title: NE-71 South - Kimball County
item.description: NE-71 south in Kimball County, Nebraska.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 20 Gore
item.description: Exit 20 gore on I-80 west. This is a standard Nebraska exit gore sign.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 20
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 20 - NE-71 South/Kimball. NE-71 leaves I-80 westbound here.

item.title: NE-71 South at I-80
item.description: NE-71 south at I-80. Turn right for I-80 West/NE-71 South; continue under overpass for I-80 East.

item.title: NE-71 South at I-80
item.description: NE-71 south at I-80. Use I-80 West/NE-71 South for Cheyenne, WY; I-80 East for Sidney.

item.title: NE-71 South Approaching I-80
item.description: NE-71 south approaching I-80. NE-71 south joins I-80 west through Kimball.

item.title: End NE-53E Link at NE-71
item.description: End NE-53E Link at NE-71. Use NE-71 north for Gering and Scottsbluff. Use NE-71 south for I-80.

item.title: US-30 East at NE-53E Link
item.description: US-30 east at NE-53E Link. Use NE-53E Link for NE-71 and I-80 (via NE-71).

item.title: NE-71 North - Nebraska
item.description: Nebraska…The Good Life on NE-71 North. Taken at the Colorado-Nebraska stateline.

item.title: NE-71 North at I-80
item.description: NE-71 north at I-80.

item.title: NE-71 South at NE-4A Spur
item.description: NE-71 south at NE-4ASpur west to Harrisburg.

item.description: NE-71/NE-88 south to Kimball at NE-88 east to Bridgeport.

item.title: NE-88 East at NE-71
item.description: NE-88 east at NE-71.

item.title: NE-88 East at NE-71
item.description: NE-88 east at NE-71 north to Scottsbluff and south to Kimball.
